quickinstantcommons-missinghandler:
Message displayed on file pages above the image if the relavent media handler extension cannot be found. In such cases basic thumbnailing is supported, but advanced features like multiple pages, or media players for videos, are not. Message is displayed in box with border.

$1 is the url for the image description page at the foreign wiki.

$2 is the name of the foreign repository if available (e.g. {{msg-mw|shared-repo-name-wikimediacommons}}) otherwise it is {{msg-mw|quickinstantcommons-shared-repo}}.
quickinstantcommons-shared-repo: Similar to {{msg-mw|shared-repo}} except for use with {{msg-mw|quickinstantcommons-missinghandler}}
